statements: SELECT * FROM route_schedule;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_schedule WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_id, truck_id, start_time, end_time FROM route_schedule WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT driver_name, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM route_schedule WHERE truck_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_schedule WHERE end_time < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT route_id, driver_name, start_location, end_location, start_time, end_time, distance_km FROM route_schedule WHERE truck_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM route_schedule WHERE driver_name LIKE '%John%' AND distance_km > 100 ORDER BY end_time ASC
SELECT driver_name, start_location, end_location FROM route_schedule WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY driver_name ASC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM route_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-07 23:59:59' ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT truck_id, COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM route_schedule GROUP BY truck_id HAVING total_routes > 5 ORDER BY total_routes DESC
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, truck_id FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT route_id, MAX(arrival_time) FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT route_name, truck_id, driver_id FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, driver_id, truck_id FROM routes WHERE driver_id = 5 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT route_name, driver_id FROM routes INNER JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM trucks
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes
SELECT truck_name, capacity FROM trucks WHERE capacity > 500
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance <= 100
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, truck_id, delivery_date FROM deliveries
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT truck_name, capacity FROM trucks ORDER BY truck_name ASC, capacity DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, route_id FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_id, truck_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, truck_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM trucks WHERE capacity_kg >= 500 ORDER BY capacity_kg ASC, driver_name DESC;
SELECT truck_id, driver_name, current_location FROM trucks WHERE current_location = 'City A' OR current_location = 'City B';

SELECT deliveries.delivery_id, deliveries.route_id, routes.start_location, routes.end_location, deliveries.delivery_status FROM deliveries JOIN routes ON deliveries.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';

SELECT schedules.schedule_id, schedules.departure_time, schedules.arrival_time, routes.start_location, routes.end_location FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE schedules.departure_time < '12:00:00' ORDER BY schedules.departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM trucks
SELECT driver_name, capacity FROM trucks ORDER BY driver_name ASC
SELECT end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT location_name, arrival_time FROM delivery_points WHERE arrival_time > NOW()
SELECT delivery_time, delivery_status FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM trucks WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY truck_number ASC
SELECT driver_name, truck_number FROM trucks INNER JOIN driver_schedules ON trucks.id = driver_schedules.driver_id WHERE date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT DISTINCT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 1000
SELECT delivery_status, delivery_time, location_name FROM deliveries INNER JOIN delivery_points ON deliveries.point_id = delivery_points.point_id ORDER BY delivery_time DESC
SELECT driver_name, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules INNER JOIN trucks ON driver_schedules.driver_id = trucks.id WHERE start_time < '10:00:00'
